participant_1.background:
I just fed my dog.
i love walking in the park.
i sell clothing on facebook.
I lift heavy weights and enjoy a meatless diet.
i spend a lot of time watching obscure foreign film on netflix.

participant_2.background:
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I enjoy spending time with my horses and riding them.
i grow the tallest sunflowers you have ever seen.
i usually catch sunfish.
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
That's good to hear! What are your hobbies?
I like to walk in the park, sell clothing on facebook, lift heavy weights, and enjoy a meatless diet.
That sounds really fun! I enjoy spending time with my horses and riding them, growing the tallest sunflowers you have ever seen, and usually catching sunfish.
Wow, that's amazing! I've always wanted to learn how to ride a horse.
It's a lot of fun! I love the feeling of being up in the air, and the connection you feel with the horse.
I bet that's a great feeling. I've always loved animals, so I think I'd enjoy riding a horse.
I'm sure you would! It's a great way to get outside and enjoy nature.
I agree! I'm glad you're enjoying your hobbies.
Thank you! I am. What are some of your favorite movies?
I love watching obscure foreign films on netflix. I find them so interesting and different from what I'm used to seeing.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never seen a foreign film on netflix, but I'd be willing to give it a try.
I highly recommend it! You can find some really great movies that you'd never see in theaters.
I'll have to check it out sometime. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to share my love of foreign films.
